TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase
Public NotInheritable Class MsmqIntegrationBindingElement Inherits MsmqBindingElementBase

summary.span: 此绑定元素可用于使 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 应用程序发送消息到满足以下条件的现有 MSMQ 应用程序或接受来自这些应用程序的消息：或者使用 COM、MSMQ 本机 API，或者使用 中的 API。

span.span: This binding element can be used to enable Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications to send messages to and receive messages from existing MSMQ applications that use either COM, MSMQ native APIs, or the APIs in .

summary.span: 使用此类可以向基于 MSMQ 的消息应用程序发送消息，或从这些应用程序接收消息。

span.span: Use this class to send and receive messages from MSMQ-based messaging applications.

span.span: An MSMQ integration channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing MSMQ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可生成通道工厂，这样开发人员就可创建客户端通道，从而与服务进行通信。This method builds a channel factory that enables the developer to create a client channel to communicate with a service. 通道工厂不是一个通道，而是一个能够创建通道的工厂。The channel factory is not a channel, but rather a factory that can create a channel. 您可通过调用 `IChannelFactory.CreateChannel` 来创建通道。You create a channel by calling `IChannelFactory.CreateChannel`.

span.span: The context value is .
The is not .

exception.span: 为 Certificate 或 WindowsDomain，而 为 None。

span.span: is Certificate or WindowsDomain and is None.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelListener<class (class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel) TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed

returns.span: 可用于创建可从现有 MSMQ 应用程序接收消息的通道的 MSMQ 集成通道侦听器。

span.span: An MSMQ integration channel listener that can be used to create channels to receive messages from existing MSMQ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道侦听器在服务端创建，用于接收客户端通道发送的消息。Channel listeners are created on the service and are used to receive messages sent by a client channel. 该服务必须先调用 `IChannelListener.Open`，接着调用 `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel`，以获取实际通道的引用。The service must call `IChannelListener.Open` and then `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel` to get a reference to the actual channel. 然后，必须调用 `IChannel.Open` 来打开通道。Then `IChannel.Open` must be called to open the channel. 此时，该渠道就可用于检索消息了。At this point, the channel can be used to retrieve messages.

span.span: The context value is .
The is not .

exception.span: 为 Certificate 或 WindowsDomain，而 为 None。

span.span: is Certificate or WindowsDomain and is None.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可返回字符串“msmq.formatname”，从而指示 MSMQ 集成通道所使用的寻址方案。This property returns the string "msmq.formatname" to indicate the addressing scheme used by the MSMQ integration channel. 有关队列寻址的详细信息，请参阅[服务终结点和队列寻址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md)。For more information about queue addressing, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/service.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在序列化 MSMQ 消息时使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.

value.span: 要在序列化 MSMQ 消息时使用的 。

span.span: The to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有下列值之一：This property can have one of the following values: - `ActiveX` - ActiveX 序列化程序用于序列化对象。`ActiveX` - The ActiveX serializer is used to serialize objects. - `Binary` - 用于序列化对象。`Binary` - The is used to serialize objects. - `ByteArray` - 将对象序列化为一个字节数组。`ByteArray` - The object is serialized to an array of bytes. - `Stream` - 将对象序列化为流。`Stream` - The object is serialized to a stream. - `Xml` - 用于序列化对象。`Xml` - The is used to serialize objects. - 默认值为 `Xml`。The default value is `Xml`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

exception.span: 值不在 值的范围内。

span.span: The value is not within the values of .

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的数组，这些对象包含消息反序列化的目标类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of objects that contain the types to which messages should be deserialized.

value.span: 包含消息反序列化的目标类型的 的数组。

span.span: An array of that contains the types to which messages should be deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MSMQ 消息的正文未类型化。The body of an MSMQ message is not typed. 属性可用于指定到的消息反序列化从 MSMQ 应用程序到 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 接收应用程序发送时的类型。The property enables you to specify the types to which messages are deserialized when they are sent from an MSMQ application to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) receiving application. 仅当 设置为 `Xml` 时，才使用此属性。This property is used only if is set to `Xml`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/snippets.cs#4)]
